name: dermatrack
description: Helps users track and understand their eczema symptoms and triggers.
author: Bastian, Philip, Johanna, Sebastian, Sribriddhi

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c green,magenta "pnpm -C frontend dev" "node scripts/mvnw.js spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=local-h2"
scripts.build: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c green,magenta "pnpm -C frontend build" "node scripts/mvnw.js -q clean package -DskipTests"
scripts.test: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c green,magenta "pnpm -C frontend run --if-present test" "node scripts/mvnw.js -q test"
